title: Patch Notes
content: ematic in the Colony will now play even if no available player characters are in combat with him. Fixed a potential Initiative spam involving the skeletal involucres when player characters are invisible. Ketheric will no longer be fooled by distractions in the Colony. Fixed an issue that was causing Shadowheart to keep asking to retrieve the Spear of the Night at the entrance to the Shadowfell even when the Spear of the Night had already been acquired.
